title: Reduced LP loss for AFK's/DC's
body: I was curious as to what others thought about the idea of losing less LP for a loss when an you get someone who AFK's or DC's for an extended period of time until the end of the match. This is extremely frustrating in ranked when players lose 20+ LP when they get a DC and only win <20 LP. Obviously the player would have to be disconnected for a longer period of time to prevent people disconnecting themselves to prevent a loss of LP for themselves.

replies.body: Riot are not transparent in their knowledge of issues like this, they will not address this problem.

You  could bully someone on your team to the point of afk, just to reduce your LP loss when you game isn't going so well. 

It has been suggested countless times, but it is waaaaaay to easy to take advantage of.
You think riot would give a shit about real issues?
This issue was already addressed and Riot wont add something like this because as Riot Lyte said "It's Toxic"
